== Vadakkancheri-II (627707) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Vadakkancheri-II is a village in the [[Alathur]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 1675 hectares and harbouring 3502 households with total population of 14918 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 31 km. Male population is 7160 and female population is 7758. Scheduled Caste Population is 3181 and Scheduled Tribes population is 27. Census Location Code of the village is 627707<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 11589 (77.68%)
* Literate male population: 5878 (82.09%)
* Literate female population: 5711 (73.61%)
